content: Sign the 302 Hijacking Petition Search Engines By: Rand Fishkin May 25, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin May 25, 2005 Sign the 302 Hijacking Petition Search Engines The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Google has been notorious over the last 2 years for refusing (or being unable) to fix the issue of page hijacking via the 302 bug. Darren Ward, who founded SEOChat, has created an online petition that responsible webmasters and SEOs the world over should sign (digitally, of course). Hopefully, with his connections and knowledge of the industry, Darren can help to eliminate this heinous problem. Copied! Back to Top
